title: Pre-game option to not be able to type with in-game chat.
body:
I would like an option to be able to use to not be able to type in-game, while having pings so i don't have to get toxic in game.
I've tried everything imaginable and i cannot stop being toxic towards other players, so i think an option to have no chat in-game would be the best option for a lot of players like myself who don't want to do the wrong thing, but get caught up in the ranked toxicity.

replies.body: Settings > Interface > Scroll to the almost the bottom in the Chat section > Un-check *Show All-Chat* and *Show Allied Chat*
